services.title: Our Services
services.description: At Crowlee Art, we believe that true craftsmanship begins with care and ends with excellence. Whether it's a minor repair or a major installation, we bring dedication, detail, and deep expertise to every job. Here's what we proudly offer:
services.doorText: Precise custom fitting, hinge cutting, lock fitting, and adjustments to match the unique structure of your home.
services.repairsText: We repair handles, fixtures, locks, frames, and more‚Äîensuring things work and look as they should.
services.emergencyText: Fast response and priority attention for urgent problems across London, 7 days a week.
services.maintenanceText: Reliable, recurring maintenance for homes and small businesses‚Äîbecause prevention is key.
services.drywallText: From minor drywall repairs to full painting and finishing‚Äîflawless results with clean execution.
services.leakText: Thorough diagnostic and moisture detection for leaks, saving you time and structural damage.
services.heaterText: Safe, efficient setup of electric heating units, thermostats and wiring with certified care.
services.managementText: Support with reporting, resolution and minor works for landlords, tenants, and property owners.
services.consultText: Need help planning or sourcing? We offer transparent advice and project vision for your unique needs.
services.finalTitle: We're not just a service ‚Äî we're a trusted partner for your home.
services.finalText: Let us take care of the things that matter most. Reach out today and discover the peace of mind that comes with working with true professionals.

home.title: Crowlee Art
home.description: We provide expert home & small business maintenance, door repair and installation, flooring, painting, plumbing and much more. Crowlee Art services are across all London and Hertfordshire. Our team is dedicated to professionalism, reliability, and delivering the best quality results.
